page.title: 07RECREATION.CHILDREN'S GAMES.
page.content: Boys aged five to seven often play with{toy cars}especially in summer at home and school.Girls aged five to seven play{skipping}mostly at home and school.In summer boys and girls ofen play{running games}like{tag}and {chase.}In winter all children like making{snowmen}and{snowballs.}Boys and girls like riding their{bikes}at times during the whole year round.Boys of this age do not like copying TV shows in their games but prefer making up their own.In summer boys don't like {fishing}and{climbing trees}much and {hula hooping}is not popular at all. In winter the least favourite game appears to be{sledging!}Playing with {card}and{board games}is definitly out.
